about_the_game:
Heed the call to arms and defend the light! In this massive update, you will find more danger and rewards as you fight to stop the Chaos Elves from bringing about the end of the world. Prepare yourselves and take the plunge with a loaded Heroic Veiled Corruption Package and receive the following:

Mount: Veiled Amethyst Tekanin

Pet: Guardian Beltenus

Designer Bag (24 Slot)

Ellun (50 Pack)

Veiled Malachite Diadem

Limit 1 Heroic Veiled Corruption Package per account. Packages are not transferable.

Heed the call to arms and defend the light! In this massive update, you will find more danger and rewards as you fight to stop the Chaos Elves from bringing about the end of the world. Prepare yourselves and take the plunge with a loaded Heroic Veiled Corruption Package and receive the following:

Veiled Malachite Diadem

Limit 1 Heroic Veiled Corruption Package per account. Packages are not transferable.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista (SP2) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD A8-5500 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 7670 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD FX-6200 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 6870 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
